name: Bindookian Spices
description: Sweet, yet spicy.

name: Italiluminum Rods
description: Shiny.

name: Cryo-Pod
description: Used for refrigeration.

name: Zandooki Holo-Crystal
description: The future of nano-digital entertainment! No home is complete without one.

name: Hypnoponics Bay
description: Watched plants *do* grow, it just takes a while. Fortunately, you aren't going anywhere with this mesmerizing device.

name: MuffMouse Puff
description: This inflatable treat may be considered less-than-ethical by some, but the Kleeth love it!

name: Cubic Yaks
description: Highly prized for their milk and cheese.

name: Organic Moon Crisps
description: Made with genuine moon dust!

name: Boco Levicrystals
description: Some lovers of physics find these objects profoundly offensive.

name: Kleeth Astrocharts
description: Through arcane ceremonies known only to Kreeth mystics, these crystal spheres are imbued with complex star charts.

name: Glurf Bonzai Bush
description: The Glurf trim consider these plants a sign of sophistication and artistry- the Ewian consider them a snack.

name: ASTRO(C) Nano-Beans
description: So technologically advanced they might as well be magic!

name: Zapatronic 5000
description: This baby can heat food faster than a Bartoolian Supernova! Don't use it with MuffMice though.

name: Hyooman Abstract Art
description: Many races find these objects to be puzzling... or sophisticated?

name: MuffMice
description: These cute little critters taste Surprisingly Fantastic(C) whether they're live, fried and battered, or frozen on a stick!

name: Zymmick Plastiques
description: These plastiques are used to manufacture all sorts of things- from toothbrushes to starships!

name: Hyooman Exotic Hair Products
description: Prized by hairless races everywhere!

name: Ewian Jewelry
description: Ewian craftsheep have perfected the art of carving intricate tear-shaped gemstones and fasioning them into beautiful works of art that all neck-enabled creatures will enjoy!

name: Triple-Zork Batteries
description: They aren't included with most products.

name: Plutranium Kleeth Tea Set
description: A sign of sophistication and culture in any Kleeth world.

name: Ewian Ginger
description: Highly regarded for its medical and ... recreational uses.

name: Data Cubes
description: Everybody likes data! Cyntix even eat them!

name: Glurf Fuzzy-Silk
description: This curious cloth is naturally plaid-colored and completely natural!

name: Universal Credit
description: These credits are the galaxy's universal credit- so long as you're Cyntix.
